description:
Advanced Neogeo arcade and home system emulator based on Gngeo 0.8-svn (GPL). Runs around 60fps on a stock Pre. It requires user-supplied romsets from MAME 0.144 or similar for correct operation (neogeo.zip, etc). View the full compatibility list on the website.

Features include:
* Memory card and save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states
* Universe Bios or MVS support (Unibios recommended, named uni-bios_2_3.rom)
* Direct editing of Unibios region and mode settings without having to enter its boot menu
* Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls & keyboard support
* iCade support (WebOS 2.0 or later)
* Portrait/Landscape orientation support 

Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:
https://twitter.com/rakashazi

Visit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps.

Note: Video shows app running on an Android device, but core functionality is the same as on WebOS
